# Public Folder

This folder contains static assets that will be served directly.

## Resume File

Place your resume PDF file here with the name `resume.pdf`. This file will be accessible at `/resume.pdf` when the site is deployed.

The "SEE MY RESUME" button in the Hero section links to this file.

## Instructions

1. Add your resume PDF file to this folder
2. Name it exactly: `resume.pdf`
3. The button will automatically work once the file is added
